description:
SWPBL-188324 & SWPBL-199720
    Verify that locationID is stored to /jffs/localsettings.txt and ensure after anacapa restart that the registration message carries the locationID
    :param module_dut:
    :param mock_player_services_control:
    :return:

steps.name: Trigger job with job_text from :1400/jobs page

parameters.name: zp
parameters.value: SonosZoneComponent(id=140129307323920, ip=172.19.255.251, modelNumber=S39, serialNumber=0003861038EC, architecture=optimo, hardware_version=1.38.1.0-1.0)

steps.name: Wait for player connection and registration with mock lechmere

parameters.name: module_dut
parameters.value: SonosZoneComponent(id=140129307323920, ip=172.19.255.251, modelNumber=S39, serialNumber=0003861038EC, architecture=optimo, hardware_version=1.38.1.0-1.0)

steps.name: Verify reg message sent to mock lechmere.

parameters.name: module_dut
parameters.value: SonosZoneComponent(id=140129307323920, ip=172.19.255.251, modelNumber=S39, serialNumber=0003861038EC, architecture=optimo, hardware_version=1.38.1.0-1.0)

steps.name: Trigger job with job_text from :1400/jobs page
